text: Ewa Maria Demarczyk (16 January 1941, born in Kraków, Poland – 14 August 2020, in Kraków) was a Polish singer. She started singing in 1961. Two years later she won an award at the National Festival of Polish Song in Opole. Demarczyk ended her career in 1999. She has 3 albums. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Singers from Kraków
title: Ewa Demarczyk
